channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Radiator View Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Radiator View Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2263|2024-08-04T07:01:41.256Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20radiator%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Radiator View Plugin 1.29 and earlier does not escape the full name of the jobs in tooltips, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.
